overview:
Known for the ability to blend strategic thinking, business acumen, and technical knowledge to deliver practical solutions, Rajen heads the Engineering and Operations teams at gBox, Inc. As VP of Engineering and Operations, Rajen is responsible for the end-to-end development and delivery of gBox’s web properties and widgets.

Previously, Rajen was Director of Engineering at Navio Systems, where he was charged with initiating and growing their consumer-facing product development efforts. Prior to Navio, Rajen held senior engineering management positions at Macrovision, where he launched three new products to market under the Flexnet Platform initiative. In his 10+ year career, Rajen also held Solutions Architect and IT Engineering Lead positions at Commerce One, Agilent Technologies, and Hewlett Packard.

Rajen received dual B.A. degrees in Computer Science and Molecular and Cell Biology from the University of California, Berkeley.
